comments_since_last_sample.body: I love your small space renter-friendly renos!  Great ideas, beautiful space - feels at least twice its actual size.  Well done, team AG!
Really nice. But I would need more color. At least changing the bedspread was a start. I think the faux headboard should have been a deeper color. And the wallpaper behind the desk should have color.

Well done! You inspired so many ideas for my small studio apartment two years ago, I learned many little tricks, and I'm so grateful for it <3 also, I would LOVE to work at Team AG, it looks like you guys are having so much fun :))
triangular work table would pull the monitor into shade but its unreasonable not to allow people to at least put a shelf or a painting on the wall of such a small space
